description.value:
You take great delight in breaking down objects to their component parts so they can be rebuilt into something new. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Thievery checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Disable a Device]{Disable Device} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Pick a Lock]{Pick Lock}. Whenever you successfully Disable Device, you harvest useful parts from the device for future use, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus on your next Crafting check to Craft or Repair. If the device you disabled was of a level higher than your own, this bonus increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Scrapper's Ingenuity]
